```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(socviz)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r set-up-data}
mydata <- read_csv("data/mysemesterdata.csv")

mydata <- mydata %>%
  rename("date" = "Date",
         "period" = "Period",
         "events" = "Notable Events",
         "rating" = "Rating/10",
         "cry" = "Cry count",
         "cry_reasons" = "Cry Reasons")
```
